title: Himi 121
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’E hoku ‘Otua koe
Tupu’anga koe;
Mo hono mo’ui’anga,
‘O e fiefia.
2.
Ko hoku ‘aho ngingila,
Pea lelei lahi;
‘Oku ‘i he ‘Afiona,
Mo ‘eku pō lelei.
3.
Kapau ‘e fakahā koe
‘I he pōpō’uli;
‘E maamangia ai leva.
Hoku laumālie.
4.
Ko hoku fetu’u’aho,
‘A e ‘Afiona.
Pea ko e la’ā ulo,
Ki he laumālie.
5.
‘Oku ulo ‘e he langi
‘O takatakai au;
‘I he ngaahi huelo ni
‘O e fiefia. *
